name: Payment Fees for WooCommerce
author: Aryus Software Applications UG (haftungsbeschr√§nkt)

sections.description:
Payment Fees for WooCommerce allows you to add custom fees for payment methods to your products.
This plugin has the huge advantage for you that you no longer need to include the fees of your payment providers into your products.
You also can add fees to product categories, which automatically get applied to shopping cart and checkout.
sections.installation:
Extract payment-fees-for-woocommerce.zip
Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu on WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Updated functionality for better performance
  • Added support for adding fees to your product categories
  • Added support for additional payment methods
  • Fixed minor bugs

1.0.0

Initial plugin release
